skills.name: Arcane Blast
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a mysterious energy and stuns them for 1 turn with an 18% chance.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Lightning Nova
skills.description: Explodes compressed energy of lightning to inflict damage to an enemy. The more HP the targeted enemy currently has, the larger the damage becomes.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1
skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(4.0*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Target's HP percentage in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Target Current HP %</mark> + 5.0)

skills.name: Tempest
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a violent storm. Becomes instantly reusable if an enemy dies.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Reduce Cooltime
skill_effect.description: Reduces cool down counter of skills by 1 or more
